title: Rengar or Renekton?

replies.body:
Much better choices than Renekton top (Gnar, Reksai, Riven, Jax, AD Crit Garen, Tryndamere)
Rengar is okay if you decide to main him but I honestly takes too long to master him. 

From a jungle perspective just play Vi/Fiddle/J4/Xin Zhao if you want quick elo gains.

Renekton isn't a jungler, and since his changes in the recent patch, trying to jungle him has gotten harder.

Both do well with full AD builds. But its best to build 1 or 2 defensive items on Rengar and 2 or 3 on Renekton to get the best out of them.

Renekton isn't a jungler from my knowledge (lane bully top yeah)

They both benefit from your general ADC rune/masterys, but going glass cannon on either isn't a good thing, generally tank to off-tank is the way to go.
